website_summaries.verdict: A hint of nostalgia comes with this camera from Polaroid that stands out from the rest.
pros: Vintage-looking photos are no problem with this camera
It produces larger photos than other models, and the photographs are higher in quality
The camera also features an automatic flash

customer_reviews.title: Some foibles
customer_reviews.text: I'm ok with things being a little off on a product this old, but product description said "very good". It's not. The shutter button sticks. Every time I put in new film, it burns the first three sheets (that stuff ain't cheap). There's a CONSIDERABLE light leak or internal scratch that causes a pretty gnarly mark on the upper left of every picture. I could have gotten something of this quality off ebay for 15 bucks. Womp.
customer_reviews.author: Bolla R.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: The first one they sent did not work, but after I reported it they sent me another one very quickly which works well, no issues. Happy with the company and reasonably priced Polaroid camera. Love the nostalgia of using this, and it's a big hit at parties or when I have visitors. I take 2 pics and give them one and I keep one. Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: G to the W

customer_reviews.title: Be careful. Ordered a refurbished camera and received a non working camera.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work. I ordered a refurbished camera. Thinking it was refurbished, I didn't think to test it. Used three film cartridges and still nothing. Will need to return. Was a birthday gift to my daughter and she immediately went from estatic to disappointed. I really should have checked it before gifting it to her.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: Good condition just the film for it is more expensive then the camera itself .. Should've looked it up before I bought it :/ anyways great cam just no film
customer_reviews.author: Bellamatus1987

customer_reviews.title: Good at first. Quickly experience issues.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera a few months ago. It was pretty good at first. Came packaged in what seemed like the original box and wrapped in plastic. I noticed some issues about a month or so after using. This isn’t my first Polaroid camera. I’ve been shooting with polaroids for years now. The issues I experienced were with the shooting button sticking. The camera seems to experience major issues with dispersing film the correct way. Over all the camera seems like a cheap knock off. I wouldn’t recommend buying tbh.
customer_reviews.author: DPJ

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: This camera came exactly as it was advertised on Amazon! It arrived in excellent condition, in its original box, and the camera functions as it should. Great beginning collector item for my daughter who loves photography.
customer_reviews.author: klc999

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: It took 12 good pictures and now I have to fix the pick arm so that I can use it again. I bought it used so it's alright for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Aminah Fox

customer_reviews.title: Great old camera
customer_reviews.text: Great old camera! Worked perfectly! I should ofind ordered more film! All my guest had a blast with this camera! Well worth the $31! Much thanks to the sender!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but be weary film is pretty pricy I cannot find it anywhere cheaper than 20$/box ...
customer_reviews.text: Steal of a deal, but be weary film is pretty pricy I cannot find it anywhere cheaper than 20$/box and that is only 8 photos. This specific product works as is and gives an awesome vintage look. The best thing is about these things is people are always willing to pay some money to capture a moment.
customer_reviews.author: Nicsaw

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORKING
customer_reviews.text: I received this camera Monday. Extremely excited about taking pictures. I bought film for it as well, opened the camera put the film in and it didn't work. I watched several youtube video and read instructions and still isn't working? What's going on here ?
customer_reviews.author: Bradford Coffman

customer_reviews.title: Great price, like new
customer_reviews.text: I already know the film to this camera is more expensive than the actually camera. I was told this camera was used but it came like new basically. Phenomenal purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: A classic
customer_reviews.text: This camera is so amazing. I wanted a actual Polaroid (not a Fuji instant mini) and this is perfect for an affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Just Like You Remember!
customer_reviews.text: So the color is meh, low light is fair, sunlight OK, but this is super fun! Works great! Shake the pictures so you think you're in control of your universe!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rosenfeld

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CAMERA VERY REASONABLE LOVE IE
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughters 26th birthday. She LOVES It. Reminds me of when I was little and my mom taking pictures with her Polaroid. I have one of these and I LOVE it. Thanks FAST SHIPPING
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Fishel

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t work. It never worked and it’s just sitting in my closet.
customer_reviews.author: She

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought it used for 26 dol I love it The film is expensive, but i really like the pics
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for !
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for this great item! My late grandfather used to have one everywhere he went . I was looking to have a surprise for Christmas Eve to help remember him and our traditions !
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Regan

customer_reviews.title: I didn't realize it would take 20-30 minutes for the ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize it would take 20-30 minutes for the picture to develop. I went with the Polaroid 300 instead.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Lover

customer_reviews.title: Decent camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: For a used camera it was pretty good too bad I lost it
customer_reviews.author: Jaycole

customer_reviews.title: 90's memories
customer_reviews.text: Very cute item! Brings me back to being a kid of the 90's again!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Bevins

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Almost perfect. Works fine and all but has a few scratches. I wish it was flawless :I
customer_reviews.author: Yousuf Rafeeq

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't take pictures. It turns on and when you ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't take pictures. It turns on and when you put the film in a film comes out but when I press the take picture button it doesn't work. The film goes with the camera, but it doesn't take pictures and it's on. [Yes I put the film in correctly]
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely love my Polaroid
customer_reviews.text: Definitely love my Polaroid! Film is a little expensive but it is so much fun and in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra McCartt

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as described and charged ready to go. Definately an old style photo don't expect a super clean picture taken.
customer_reviews.author: Fermented waste

customer_reviews.title: Overall the camera itself was a good purchase, and a blast from the past
customer_reviews.text: The camera worked well, however the film I received did not work well. Overall the camera itself was a good purchase, and a blast from the past.
customer_reviews.author: D'ereka Bolden

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought back memories. I got one for my birthday 30 yrs ago
customer_reviews.author: stacy adams-wright

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the product and happy with the seller!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Dooley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera! Really happy with the customer service. Camera in perfect condition when arrived, works great.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: Was a great Christmas gift. My boyfriend lived it. Used but in great condition
customer_reviews.author: Lexy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So amazing, perfect condition. Beautiful pictures. So happy with it:D
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect, now all i need is the film to ...
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect, now all i need is the film to test it out! Not sure how the pictures will look but everything seems in good condition
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and very cheap compared to others I've seen! Was delivered before the posted date which was great!
customer_reviews.author: Raysha

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty cool, glad I got it for my gf for our 4 year anniversary
customer_reviews.author: brandon waddell

customer_reviews.title: 15th Birthday Party Camera Was Fun!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Polaroid camera was given as a gift for my granddaughter's 15th birthday :) she has wanted one for a long time and was very happy to get the camera!!!! Works great and she really enjoyed taking pictures at her party with it and still enjoys taking pictures :) :) :) :)
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Polaroid 600
customer_reviews.text: It's a great camera although my pictures have been coming out blurry. I had purchased my film from impossible and it's not really good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Zazueta

customer_reviews.title: This product was amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This product was amazing!!! i was scared because it was only 20 dollars but amazon is pretty good about returns so i figured why not seeing as they retail for like 200-300 bucks. i had a little trouble learning how to use it because i didn't want to break it but i looked up how to do it on youtube and its my favorite thing ever!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Barranco

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: This classic Polaroid works perfectly! I love bringing it with me to festivals I just wish the film was cheaper
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Damaskinos

customer_reviews.title: Vintage jewel
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm. My niece was snapping pictures right out of the box. Item was described perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Rob H

customer_reviews.title: Polaroid One Step Close-up 600 Instant Camera
customer_reviews.text: The Five stars is not for the camera but for the business (California Seller) that sent it to me. The film was expired and then I found out it has because ALL of the film is expired because the Polaroid One Step is discontinued. California Seller took great care of us and was VERY professional while doing so. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: James C. Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Party Booth, Yes?
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing just get it. Your the kind of photographer that knows how to capture the moment, right? Party booth? Yes
customer_reviews.author: Elijah Grady

customer_reviews.title: Camera didn't work, I want a refund.
customer_reviews.text: It came broken. Honestly, I want my money back. When I got the camera, the film drawer was off-kilter, so I couldn't take any photos. I got it fixed, but it still didn't work. I was able to take 1 picture. That's it. One. Despite the fact that it came with a letter claiming that it definitely worked. I feel completely conned out of $77 (alone, without shipping!) and I really do not recommend getting this. Maybe other cameras have worked, but seeing as my experience with my camera was bad, I don't recommend putting that much faith and money into a product that may or may not work. Ugh. I want a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: ... the rite film to put in it i will love even more
customer_reviews.text: if ever i find the rite film to put in it i will love even more
customer_reviews.author: Al LoVoi

customer_reviews.title: Got it early! Good condition, some dings/ scratches. Nothing catastrophic but not in mint condition.
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to take a picture, but I'm very excited too! The scratches are very minor and personally I look right past them. Ecstatic how early it got to me.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Iandoli

customer_reviews.title: Camera does NOT WORK properly.
customer_reviews.text: The camera does not work properly. The pictures come out wrong: blurry, brown, overexposed, you can only see the silhouettes. We've tried everything: different lighting, distances, different kinds of film (compatible with the camera, of course) and nothing works. We're very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: María R. B.

customer_reviews.title: ... moreover impossible 600 films are not fit in i waste 2 impossible films than i contacted seller he gave ...
customer_reviews.text: My camera's film is discontuniued by manufacturer moreover impossible 600 films are not fit in i waste 2 impossible films than i contacted seller he gave me also discontiuned film and said '' you should buy these since what i gave you is old, batterries might poor'' after that he proved that camera is working but i have to buy discontiunued polaroid 600 films which i wasnt thinking before therefore i wont waste money on wishing a camera film might work. i want polaroid with working all 600 films if not i want refund please consider. thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great delivery
customer_reviews.text: The product was expected to arrive between December 12th and December 30th. This was bit irritating as it is a large window and doesn't really help. however, It arrived two days before the first date (December 10th). This was very helpful for the holiday season
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my daughter and she did not like the quality of the picures and was dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin J Castro

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Camera was in AMAZING condition! i loved it!! I'm in love with the way it takes photos and how fun and easy it is to use! Fast shipping, good packaging. Loved loved loved it
customer_reviews.author: jaxiswack

customer_reviews.title: Camera is terrible
customer_reviews.text: This camera is terrible. The pictures are real bad and I would like to return it. Can you help? Neil
customer_reviews.author: Neil Stewart

customer_reviews.title: It's Great!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so thankful I bought this camera. I love it. I show it to all my friends and relatives. I've been inseparateable since I received the camera. It works just as well as it looks too. No problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tip

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this camera for a gift and have been extremely disappointed with the quality of the photos it produced. They tend to be grainy. Be wary of buying any Polaroid film as the factory closed several years ago and any film sold has expired and does not develop well.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde M.

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this camera for my daughter's birthday and I was kind of late doing it. I did not think it would be shipped right away and that I would get it in time. It was shipped the same day and I got it in 3 days.. A few days before her birthday...I was so happy when I saw it sitting in my porch...I know she will be happy...It is a very nice, clean camera...Great for the price I paid..Thanks so much..You really made my day...
customer_reviews.author: Berrin Aksavrin

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly than I expected, Wanted to start using this camera to capture memories and put them all over my walls, Obviously very teenlike of me. But Also wanted to get this camera before it hit my dads birthday so I can take vintage pictures. Super excited to test it out but seems like it's in good condition no missing parts everything seems great! :D
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Jane

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy used
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera used. I took one picture and the camera never worked again after that
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: I purchase the camera as a gift for my 14 years old granddaughter and she stated she do not like the camera. She keep have problem the camera and did not realize how expensive the film is for the camera.
customer_reviews.author: wkvmeso

customer_reviews.title: Great & Requires Practice
customer_reviews.text: The camera was in great shape and it works and everything. I purchased film separately and when I used it, taking pictures was a bit difficult. Hard to keep the whole camera steady and pull the trigger, as well as the pictures not coming in totally right. Might be the films fault or just mine because this type of Polaroid requires practice sense it has light/dark settings and indoor/outdoor settings. But, over all it was great!
customer_reviews.author: Trinity Blair
